desc: The World's Most Trusted Harem Pants Brand Since 2014. We make cotton harem pants your legs will thank you for. Our bohemian pants comprise quality Thai cotton & double stitching. They get softer over time. Unisex, versatile & available in plus sizes & matching kids harems. Each sale helps save Thailand's stray dogs.

layout.text: The original 100% cotton harem pants hand-made in Thailand since 2014.
